name: Ben Fishwick D&D Basement SFAS
description:
My Submission for the Sumo digital Search for a star competition. 

It is a basement set in a world where dungeons and dragons has been outlawed and people have to play it in secret.

Sketchfab Link: https://skfb.ly/6vWGB

Artstation Link: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/VxYoZ
